Pinged orbs will regenerate in 2s (up to 3 orbs will regenerate during Berserk Form). Dark Impulse is consumed over time except in Matrix. Whenever Crocotta would take DMG, Dark Impulse is consumed instead to negate the incoming DMG. Crocotta exits Berserk Form when Dark Impulse is empty.
result: - Dark DMG increases by 20% in Berserk Form.

description.desc: Charges at the enemy and claws them for Dark DMG.

In  Annihilation State, entering the Matrix will grant  1 Annihilation Orb, launching Basic Attacks will consume Annihilation Pts. When the Annihilation Pts drop to  0 or when another character is switched in, Luna will exit  Annihilation State. Switching to another character will consume all Annihilation Pts. Gains  30% Extra DMG Reduction while casting skills. Becomes invincible for  0.3s after casting  R020: Mirage. Physical DMG increases by  10% while  Battle Stance is active (if 9S and A2 are also in the team, this effect increases to  20%).

result: - The enhanced Basic Attack deals 300% Physical DMG in total.

description.desc: Unleashes a series of attacks forward, dealing Physical DMG.
result: - Deals 200% / 400% / 600% Physical DMG in total based on the number of orbs pinged.

If A2 leaves the field while Berserk Mode is active, POD: Shield will continue to diminish until fully depleted. While A2 is on standby, Berserk Mode will deactivate if POD: Shield is fully depleted.
result: - In Berserk Mode, Extra DMG Reduction increases by 60%.

result: - Deals 210% / 420% / 630% Physical DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.

description.desc: Liv: Empyrea creates an energy matrix to deal Physical DMG (Fire DMG instead on a 3-Ping) to enemies in a rectangular area and imprison them based on the number of orbs pinged.
result: - Deals 200% / 400% / 600% Physical DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.
- Imprisons for 1.5 / 2 / 2.5s based on the number of orbs pinged.

desc: Basic Attacks and pinging orbs accumulate Prayer. When it is full,  double tapping the Dodge button triggers  Divine Prayer that grants DMG Reduction. While in Divine Prayer, it is allowed to ping 2 sets of orbs. The orbs pinged during the prayer will amplify it and increase the base multiplier. Each time orbs are pinged, triggers  Prayer Ripple that deals Fire DMG to enemies, imprisons them, and heals allies. When  Core Passive - Ode for Everlight reaches Lv.22, entering Divine Prayer will grant 1 random Signal Orb, and casting Oaths will restore Dodge Energy.
result: - Divine Prayer grants 70% DMG Reduction.
- During the prayer, 1 / 2 / 3-Ping grants 1 / 2 / 4 stack(s) of amplification to the prayer, and each stack increases the base multiplier by 0.5.
- Prayer Ripple deals 400% Fire DMG to the enemies, imprisons them for 2s, and heals allies for 7.5% of their max HP.
- When Core Passive - Ode for Everlight reaches Lv.22, entering Divine Prayer will grant 1 random Signal Orb, and casting Oaths will restore 100 Dodge Energy.

desc: If both sets of Signal Orbs are of the same color, triggers  Purity Oath that deals AOE Fire DMG.
result: - Deals 400% Fire DMG.

desc: If the two sets of Signal Orbs have different colors, triggers  Chaos Oath that pulls enemies in an extremely large area, dealing Fire DMG to them and a small amount of dodgeable DMG to Liv: Empyrea.
result: - Deals 400% Fire DMG.

description.desc: Liv: Empyrea enters Empyreal State with her M.I.N.D. plunged into a corrupted data space, gaining full Prayer and 6 random Signal Orbs (with a guaranteed set of 3-Ping orbs) while triggering Time Lag Calculation.

While in Empyreal State, double tapping the Dodge button will trigger Empyreal Prayer, during which Empyreal Prayer can be amplified by pinging 3 sets of orbs of any color. When Empyreal Prayer ends, Liv performs Empyreal Oath, dealing Fire DMG to targets in an extremely large area while triggering Time Lag Calculation. If Empyreal Prayer is not triggered, Empyreal Oath will be performed without any amplification when Empyreal State ends.
result: - Deals 1000% Fire MG.
- 1 / 2 / 3-Ping grants Empyreal Prayer 1 / 2 / 4 stack(s) of amplification and each stack increases the base multiplier by 0.5.

description.desc: Dives into battle and releases an energy blast in the air, dealing Fire DMG and restoring HP.
result: - Deals a total of 600% Fire DMG and restores HP equal to 60% of her ATK.

description.desc: Increase ATK of all members by 10%. Increases Extra DMG of all Amplifiers in the team by 5%.
All switched-in members gain an extra 10% ATK and 10% Elemental DMG Bonus of the Amplifier's element for 10s.

levels.desc: Entering Matrix outside of  Empyreal State automatically triggers  Divine Prayer with  4 stacks of amplification based on the color of currently available orbs. When Liv: Empyrea heals her allies, grants  Fire Tempered to them for  8s.  Fire Tempered: Fire DMG Bonus increases by  10%.

Amplifiers' Class Skill effect increases by  100%,  Core Passive - Ode for Everlight charges  100% faster, and the Fire DMG Bonus granted by  Fire Tempered increases to  20%. While performing  Signature - Sea of Sangharama, reaching  8 stacks of amplification within the first 2 pings during  Empyreal Prayer will grant 3 random Signal Orbs of the same color.

Liv: Empyrea gains  40 Signature Energy when switched in. If the amplification stacks are maximized during  Empyreal Prayer while casting  Signature - Sea of Sangharama,  Empyreal Oath will deal  1.5x DMG.

result: - Burning Blow can be cast when there is at least 200 Pressure.

desc: Gains Super Armor and  50% Extra DMG Reduction while in the Anti-gravity status.

- Deals 400% Dark DMG.

result: - Deals 1200% Dark DMG.

result: - Deals 600% Dark DMG.

description.desc: Increases Dark DMG of all members by 10%. Increases DMG of all Tank Omniframes in the team by 5%.
Attacks reduce the target's Extra DMG Reduction by 20% for 5s.

levels.desc: Karenina: Scire gains an Anti-gravity Shield equal to  10% of max HP for every set of 3-Ping Orbs consumed when charging.

Upon dealing damage, inflicts a  Chain Fusion effect that reduces the target's Dark Resistance by  15% for  3s. When Karenina: Scire starts charging, the Signal Orbs will be rearranged in the order of red, blue, and yellow.

Gains an extra 3-Ping chance triggered by pressing and holding Basic Attack to charge (up to three times). Upon the third 3-Ping, the corresponding Leap Attack will deal  400% more Base DMG, and Radiant Whirlwind will deal  75% more Base DMG. Upon casting  Starshatter Horizon, Karenina: Scire will generate a  15s  Thermal Field, dealing  75% Dark DMG once to targets entering the field and inflicting them with  Chain Fusion that reduces Dark Resistance by  15% for  10s.

When in the Anti-gravity status, Karenina: Scire deals  10% more Dark DMG. Dealing damage will reduce the target's Extra DMG Reduction by  5% for  8s. Triggering this effect again will renew its duration. Press and hold Basic Attack to start charging and immediately activate QTEs that are not in cooldown.  Radiant Whirlwind's spin speed will automatically increase.

When a teammate casts their Signature Move, it will provide a set of 3-Ping Orbs to Karenina: Scire who is on standby. (Each teammate can only trigger this once after entering the field.) Karenina gains an extra 3-Ping chance triggered by pressing and holding Basic Attack to charge (up to four times). Upon the fourth 3-Ping, the Base DMG of  Leap Attack increases by  600% and the Base DMG of  Radiant Whirlwind increases by  200%.
Radiant Whirlwind gains  30% Extra DMG Bonus.
Starshatter Horizon gains  40% Extra DMG Bonus. Karenina: Scire will gain 3 Signal Orbs of a random color every time being switched in.

desc: After casting a 3-Ping, tap Basic Attack repeatedly to charge up the Rising Engine. result: - Deals 3200% Lightning DMG in total.

Gains 20% Extra DMG Bonus and a shield that absorbs DMG up to 20% of max HP for 10s when the character is deployed.

levels.desc: Movement speed increases by  50% for  5s after dodging.
ATK increases by  5% and, every time entering battle,  Gear Level goes up by 1.

result: Leaps into the air and hurls the Swordstaff to the ground, dealing 480% Physical DMG.

- When Alpha holds the odachi, each swordwave deals 50% Lightning DMG.

When casting Unquenchable Flare, Alpha becomes invincible but is unable to cast Signature - Weave: Karmic Inferno.

- Thunderous Bash deals 940% Lightning DMG in total.

desc: When  wielding the kodachi, Alpha can only use Blue Orb skills. Her Basic Attacks will only grant Blue Orbs, which will be arranged in front of her other orbs by default. When  wielding the odachi, Alpha can only use Red or Yellow Orb Skills. Her Basic Attacks will only grant Red or Yellow Orbs, and Blue Orbs will be randomly converted into Red or Yellow Orbs.

skills.name: Sundered Delusion
skills.button_press: Press and hold Dodge to enter Foresight Charge

desc: Press and hold Dodge to enter  Foresight Charge, gaining  Blade Aura over time. During this time, Lucia: Crimson Weave gets Super Armor and  30% DMG Reduction, is unable to restore the Dodge Gauge, and enters the Parry Stance. Pinging Signal Orbs can also increase  Blade Aura.
result: - Restores 4 Blade Aura every 0.1s in Foresight Charge Mode.
- Gains 10 / 20 / 40 Blade Aura based on the number of the orbs pinged.
- Blade Aura limit: 120.
- When taking DMG in the Parry Stance, increases DMG Reduction to 70%. Can parry up to 3 times.

desc: Press and hold Dodge to enter  Foresight Charge. Afterward, release Dodge at  0 / 60 / 120  Blade Aura to perform a powerful slash and deal Lightning DMG, during which Alpha gains Super Armor and  50% DMG Reduction and is unable to restore the Dodge Gauge.
result: - When holding the kodachi, Alpha deals 50% / 100% / 400% Lightning DMG.
- When holding the odachi, Alpha deals 110% / 220% / 880% Lightning DMG.
- Performing a powerful slash when Blade Aura is full will make Alpha invincible, clear Blade Aura, activate Selfless Stance and restore 25 Signature Energy.
- Alpha will automatically perform a powerful slash 1.5s after Blade Aura reaches the upper limit.

skills.name: Aphotic Points
skills.button_press: Gained automatically when casting Signal Orb Skills/Blading Radiance/Resolute Blow

desc: Gains  Aphotic Points every time when casting a Signal Orb Skill,  Blading Radiance, or  Resolute Blow. Casting  Unquenchable Flare will consume all  Aphotic Points to increase the Base DMG of  Unquenchable Flare's Thunderous Bash based on the  Aphotic Points consumed.
result: - Aphotic Points limit: 300. Each Aphotic Point increases the Base DMG of Unquenchable Flare's Thunderous Bash by 1%.
- Casting Resolute Blow at full Blade Aura will grant 40 Aphotic Points.
- Gains 10/20/40 Aphotic Points based on the number of orbs pinged.
- When unleashing swordwaves through Blading Radiance, restores 20 Aphotic Points every 0.5s.

result: - Deals 500% Lightning DMG in total.

description.desc: Slashes multiple times to deal  460% Lightning DMG.
Increases Lightning DMG of all members by 10%. Increases ATK of all Attacker Omniframes in the team by 10%.

levels.desc: Casting  Resolute Blow at full  Blade Aura will also activate all available QTES.
Aphotic Point limit increases to  600. 3-Ping Skills and  Resolute Blow gain  50 bonus  Aphotic Points. Casting  Signature - Weave: Splashing Thunder will trigger Matrix if it is not on cooldown.
Upon entering battle, the first  Resolute Blow cast will restore an addition of  20 Signature Energy. Base DMG of Signal Orb Skills and  Resolute Blow increases by  50%.

When Alpha is  holding the odachi, making a 3-Ping will grant her a  15% Extra DMG Bonus. The Base DMG of  Signature - Weave: Karmic Inferno and  Unquenchable Flare's Leaping Thrust increase by  60% and  50% respectively. Alpha's swordwave becomes enhanced when casting  Blading Radiance for the first time after entering the battlefield.

Extra DMG Bonus of  Unquenchable Flare's Thunderous Bash and  Resolute Blow increases by  30%.
Extra DMG Bonus of  Unquenchable Flare's Leaping Thrust and 3-Ping Skills increases by  50%.
Extra DMG Bonus of  Signature - Weave: Karmic Inferno increases by  50%.

desc: No. 21: Feral generates a Shield equal to  50% of Max HP for  12s at the cost of  25% of her current HP when casting a 3-Ping Skill. Triggering this again will refresh the duration and increase the Shield value up to  100% of No. 21's Max HP. No. 21 gains Super Armor when having Shield.

After casting a 3-Ping Skill, No. 21 will enter the  Predator Stance. Tap Basic Attack in this stance to cast  Forceful Pounce to deal Lightning DMG, gain  Wolfspirit Points, and restore HP to allies within range. When a  purple mark appears, immediately tapping Basic Attack will cast a more powerful  Dead-on Pounce and gain more  Wolfspirit Points. During  Forceful Pounce and  Dead-on Pounce, No. 21 will gain Super Armor and  70% DMG Reduction.
result: - Red Orb 3-Ping: Forceful Pounce deals 660% Lightning DMG in total. Dead-on Pounce deals 920% Lightning DMG in total.
- Yellow Orb 3-Ping: Forceful Pounce deals 640% Lightning DMG in total. Dead-on Pounce deals 900% Lightning DMG in total.
- Blue Orb 3-Ping: Forceful Pounce deals 680% Lightning DMG in total. Dead-on Pounce deals 940% Lightning DMG in total.
- Wolfspirit Points are capped at 240.
- Casting Forceful Pounce grants 80 Wolfspirit Points while casting Dead-on Pounce grants 160 Wolfspirit Points.
- Casting Forceful Pounce and Dead-on Pounce will restore HP equal to 40% of No. 21's ATK to her allies within range.

desc: Every time entering the battlefield or casting  Signature - Sky-ripping Arcflash, No. 21: Feral will activate  Forest Predator, during which extra Signal Orbs can be pinged when casting a 3-Ping Skill to generate a  Deceleration Field and add additional Lightning DMG to  Dusk Fluorescence. When there is a  Deceleration Field, No. 21 will be invincible, the enemies will be slowed down temporarily, and  Dusk Fluorescence's purple mark will last until the  Deceleration Field is gone. Casting  Dusk Fluorescence will deactivate the  Deceleration Field. When No. 21 casts  Dusk Fluorescence and deals Lightning DMG, the Signal Orbs will be rearranged into 3-Ping sets.
result: - Up to 3 extra Signal Orbs can be pinged when casting Forest Predator. The record will be reset when Forest Predator is cast again.
- Each Signal Orb pinged will trigger a Deceleration Field for 0.5s. The Deceleration Field can be stacked.
- Each Signal Orb pinged will deal an additional 340% Lightning DMG 1 more time when casting Dusk Fluorescence.

skills.name: Wolfspirit Release
skills.button_press: Press and Hold Basic Attack/Press and Hold Basic Attack and Then Tap Basic Attack Repeatedly

desc: With max  Wolfspirit Points, press and hold Basic Attack to enter  Wolfspirit Form. When continuously holding or repeatedly tapping Basic Attack,  Growling Wolfspirit will be cast with  Wolfspirit Points. It will end with  Scratch Reap once all  Wolfspirit Points are depleted.  Growling Wolfspirit and  Scratch Reap will pull targets within range and deal Lightning DMG, granting Signature Energy to No. 21 and restoring HP to her allies within range. No. 21 can adjust her position by dodging with Super Armor and  30% DMG Reduction granted in  Wolfspirit Form.
result: - Each Growling Wolfspirit consumes 15 Wolfspirit Points, deals 80% Lightning DMG, grants No. 21 2 Signature Energy, and restores HP equal to 30% of her ATK to her allies within range.
- Scratch Reap deals 480% Lightning DMG, grants No. 21 20 Signature Energy, and restores HP equal to 80% of her ATK to her allies within range.

desc: Wolfspirit Release attacks grant  Critical Arclight. Casting  Signature - Sky-ripping Arcflash will consume all  Critical Arclight and increase  Signature - Sky-ripping Arcflash's Base DMG.
result: - Critical Arclight is capped at 100 points with each Critical Arclight point increasing Signature - Sky-ripping Arcflash's Base DMG by 1%.
- In the Wolfspirit Form, each Growling Wolfspirit grants 5 Critical Arclight, while each Scratch Reap grants 20 Critical Arclight.

desc: Allies gain  Lightning Surge which increases their Lightning DMG by  10% for  8s after being healed. The duration resets every time it is triggered

After the  Wolfspirit Release, each  Growling Wolfspirit will consume double  Wolfspirit Points, cause damage and healing of the same amount  one more time, and make No. 21 gain Signature Energy and  Critical Arclight 100% faster. Signal Orb Skills' Base DMG increases by  30%.

Increases the effects of the Amplifier Class Skill by  100%.  Each extra Signal Orb pinged in the  Forest Predator Form will make No. 21 deal Lightning DMG  2 times through  Dusk Fluorescence instead.
Signature - Sky-ripping Arcflash's Extra DMG Bonus increases by  20%.
Extra DMG Bonus of 3-Pings and  Wolfspirit Release increases by  30%.
Extra DMG Bonus of  Dusk Fluorescence and  Forest Predator increases by  20%.

desc: Cecily fights alongside Echo. Press and hold Basic Attack to make Echo enter Tactical Cipher. In Tactical Cipher, Signal Orbs will be temporarily replaced by Cipher Orbs.

result: Each swordwave deals 30% Physical DMG.

skills.name: Sinbreaker's Judgment
skills.button_press: During Tactical Cipher + Ping Cipher Orbs consecutively

desc: Upon entering Tactical Cipher, Echo starts charging, during which time Cecily will prevent enemies from attacking her and repel them. Echo gains Super Armor for 1.5s and 40% DMG Reduction. Cooldown: 5s. Keep pinging Cipher Orbs or drag the joystick to keep charging.

When orbs are no longer pinged or when the joystick is released, Echo will stop charging and fire a Sinbreaker's Arrow, dealing Physical DMG. Echo can dodge attacks when performing this move. Cecily will then attack in the order of the Cipher Orbs pinged, with each attack consuming one Cipher Orb. After Echo exits the battlefield, Cecily will stay and continue to attack enemies until all Cipher Orbs are consumed.
result: - When fully charged, Sinbreaker's Arrow deals 580% Physical DMG, rearranges all Signal Orbs into 3-Pings, and activates Judgment Zone, which heals allies within for 80% of Echo's ATK for 8s and grants Echo 6 Signature Energy.
- If Sinbreaker's Arrow is not fully charged, it will only deal 230% Physical DMG without activating Judgment Zone.

desc: Each orb pinged inside Judgment Zone will generate 10 Splendor Points, max 90.
Tapping Dodge inside Judgment Zone will trigger Swift Archery, dealing Physical DMG.
result: Deals 80% Physical DMG.

desc: At max Splendor Points, pinging a Signal Orb that matches the color of Cipher Orb inside Judgment Zone will trigger a Co-Strike. The first Co-Strike after Judgment Zone is activated will cast Imprisoning Co-Strike.
If Echo has Soul Shatter Mark, she can trigger another Co-Strike afterward while the Judgment Zone is still active to cast Soulbreaking Co-Strike.
result: - Imprisoning Co-Strike: Consumes all Splendor Points to imprison and pull in nearby enemies, dealing 720% Physical DMG and restoring 36 Signature Energy.

- Soulbreaking Co-Strike: Consumes Soul Shatter Mark to leap and shoot the target, dealing 576% Physical DMG and restoring 20 Signature Energy.- Echo becomes invincible during a Co-Strike but cannot cast Signature - Celestial Edge.
- Echo gains Soul Shatter Mark after casting Signature - Celestial Edge.

desc: Allies are granted Ultralimit Torque which increases their Physical DMG by 10% for 8s after being healed. The duration resets every time it is triggered.

description.desc: Fires multiple arrows at the enemy, dealing Physical DMG and healing HP.
result: - Deals 600% Physical DMG and heals for 100% of ATK in total.

description.desc: All members' ATK increases by 10%. Amplifiers' Physical DMG Bonus increases by 5%.

levels.desc: Casting Imprisoning Co-Strike and Soulbreaking Co-Strike will activate all available QTEs.
Gains a set of 3-Ping Orbs when switched in. While Judgment Zone is active, Extra DMG Bonus increases by 30%.
When Echo is switched out, Cecily immediately gains 6 bonus Cipher Orbs. After Echo exits the battlefield, Cecily gains 100% Extra DMG Bonus.

desc: When Lamia is in Primary Form, she can only cast Yellow or Blue Orb skills, and her Basic Attacks only generate Yellow or Blue Orbs.
When she is in Dark Tide Form, she can only cast Red or Blue Orb skills, and her Basic Attacks only generate Red or Blue Orbs. Yellow Orbs will be randomly converted into Red or Blue Orbs.

When Lamia casts a 3-Ping skill in Primary Form, there is a short window of time in which she can consecutively cast another 3-Ping, Torrent Orb, or Tidal Orb skill. After Lamia casts a Red Orb skill in Dark Tide Form, consecutively pinging Red Orbs allows her to cast the skill again directly during the skill action.
After Lamia casts a Blue Orb skill in Dark Tide Form, she will start swimming in water, during which she can cast the skill again to rapidly fire water spheres to attack the target.

skills.name: Drowned Conformation
skills.button_press: Primary Form + Ping Torrent Orb / Tidal Orb

desc: When Lamia casts skills through orb pings in Primary Form, she will gain Fathomless Points. For every 30 Fathomless Points, she will gain a Torrent Orb. When two Torrent Orbs are present, they will merge into a Tidal Orb.

At full Fathomless Points, pinging a Torrent Orb or Tidal Orb will deplete all Fathomless Points. When a Torrent Orb is pinged, Lamia will cast Crushing Wave, dealing Dark DMG to enemies in front while also dealing a small amount DMG to herself. When a Tidal Orb is pinged, she will cast Suffocating Tide to pull in surrounding enemies, then detonate the undercurrents to deal Dark DMG.

After casting Crushing Wave or Suffocating Tide, Lamia gains Ocean's Scar. Pinging a Torrent Orb will change the weather to Downpour. Pinging a Tidal Orb or two Torrent Orbs will change the weather to Storm. Lamia gains Super Armor and 70% DMG Reduction while casting Crushing Wave or Suffocating Tide.
result: - Fathomless Points has a maximum of 60.
- Pinging a Torrent Orb will cast Crushing Wave, dealing 600% Dark DMG in total.
- Pinging a Tidal Orb will cast Suffocating Tide, dealing 1300% Dark DMG in total.
- Each Torrent Orb pinged grants 25 Abyssal Points and 15 Signature Energy.
- Each Tidal Orb pinged grants 60 Abyssal Points and 30 Signature Energy.

skills.name: Dark Flux
skills.button_press: Dark Tide Form + Ping Torrent Orb / Tidal Orb

desc: When Lamia casts skills through orb pings in Dark Tide Form, she will gain Fathomless Points. For every 30 Fathomless Points, she will gain a Torrent Orb. When two Torrent Orbs are present, they will merge into a Tidal Orb.

When Torrent Orb and Tidal Orb are both present, the Torrent Orb will be pinged to enhance Tidal Orb, turning it into Riptide Orb.At full Fathomless Points, pinging a Torrent Orb, Tidal Orb, or Riptide Orb will deplete all Fathomless Points. When a Torrent Orb is pinged, Lamia will cast Crushing Torrent, slashing to create powerful airflows, dealing Dark DMG to enemies in front, and entering Tidal Form.

When a Tidal Orb or Riptide Orb is pinged, Lamia will cast Tidal Vortex, dealing Dark DMG. If Lamia is not in Tidal Form when casting Tidal Vortex, she will ascend to the highest point to cast Tidal Vortex, and then exit Tidal Form.Lamia gains Ocean's Scar after casting Crushing Torrent or Tidal Vortex. Lamia gains Super Armor and 70% DMG Reduction while casting Crushing Torrent and Tidal Vortex.
result: - Fathomless Points has a maximum of 90.

- Every attack grants 4 Energy.

- For the next cast of Ascended Sovereign, Quell Their Spirits, doubles the Base DMG increase effect from consuming Soul Ripple stacks. This effect does not overlap with the buffs towards Star of Dawn, Indite Their Souls granted by Rimy Valediction.

signature.name: Corporality of Peafowl, Spirit of Dragon

skills.name: Star of Dawn, Indite Their Souls

description.desc: Qu: Shukra begins Sovereign's Accession, briefly triggering Time Lag Calculation and continuously dealing Ice DMG in a large area around her. At the same time, each Inscription is converted into a 3-Ping and placed at the front of the Signal Orb bar. During Sovereign's Accession, Qu: Shukra can ping Signal Orbs or perform Basic Attacks to summon mirages from Tabula Akasha and deal Ice DMG to enemies, but cannot gain Energy. In addition, she gains Soul Ripple for every 3-Ping performed.
result: - During Sovereign's Accession, deals a total of 1200% Ice DMG in a large area around Qu: Shukra.
- During Sovereign's Accession, deals 260% / 520% / 780% Ice DMG based on the number of orbs pinged upon pinging Signal Orbs; deals 260% Ice DMG upon performing Basic Attack.
- During Sovereign's Accession, gain 1 stack of Soul Ripple for every 3-Ping performed. Maximum stacks of Soul Ripple: 4.
- During Sovereign's Accession, Qu: Shukra can ping Signal Orbs or perform Basic Attacks up to 4 times.

skills.name: Ascended Sovereign, Quell Their Spirits
skills.button_press: Sovereign's Accession + Tap Signature Move or automatically triggered when Sovereign's Accession ends

description.desc: Qu: Shukra brings together the will of Kowloong, consuming all Soul Ripple stacks and dealing Ice DMG in a large area. During this, Time Lag Calculation is triggered. If Qu: Shukra performs this skill while Enter the Fray is active, she will immediately exit Enter the Fray. If Qu: Shukra performs this skill when she does not have 4 stacks of Soul Ripple, all Signal Orbs she gained by converting Inscriptions will disappear.
result: - Deals a total of 1100% Ice DMG.
- For each stack of Soul Ripple consumed, Base DMG of Ascended Sovereign, Quell Their Spirits increases by 20%.

description.desc: Performs a powerful slash, dealing Ice DMG.
result: - Deals a total of 600% Ice DMG.

description.desc: Ice DMG of all team members increases by 10%. ATK of Attacker Omniframes increases by 10%.
Extra DMG Bonus increases by 20%.

ss_rank.name: To Climb Beyond an Endless World

levels.desc: Upon performing  Rimy Valediction,  Tor Invocation, or  Ascended Sovereign,  Quell Their Spirits, trigger all available QTEs. Upon performing the fourth move of the Basic Attack sequence after a successful dodge, Qu: Shukra will immediately activate  Enter the Fray. Activating  Enter the Fray this way does not grant an  Engravement point.

Upon performing  Star of Dawn, Indite Their Souls, immediately gain  1 stack of  Soul Ripple. After performing  Rimy Valediction, Qu: Shukra gains  3 stacks of  Soul Ripple for every 3-Ping performed during  Sovereign's Accession for the next cast of  Star of Dawn, Indite Their Souls. After performing  Tor Invocation, Base DMG increase effect of  Ascended Sovereign, Quell Their Spirits granted by each stack of  Soul Ripple increases to  45%.

sss_rank.name: To Become Dawn's Star and Vanquish the Evil

levels.desc: When Qu: Shukra activates  Enter the Fray, her Extra DMG Bonus increases by  25% for  8s.

When performing  Rimy Valediction or  Tor Invocation, Base DMG of the current cast of the skill increases by  50% for each point of  Engravement Qu: Shukra currently has. Upon performing  Fleeting Frost, performing  Rimy Valediction or  Tor Invocation during the current  Enter the Fray duration will consume 1 point of  Engravement to grant buffs from both  Rimy Valediction and  Tor Invocation for the next cast of  Star of Dawn, Indite Their Souls and  Ascended Sovereign, Quell Their Spirits.

s+_rank.name: Mine Accession, Forevermore Etched in History

levels.desc: Extra DMG Bonus of  Rimy Valediction, Fleeting Frost, and  Tor Invocation increases by  50%.
Extra DMG Bonus of 3-Pings,  Tabula Akasha - Inscribe, and Star of Dawn, Indite Their Souls increases by  50%.
Extra DMG Bonus of  Ascended Sovereign, Quell Their Spirits increases by  45%.

description.desc: Alternates between using the Chakram and Bladed Wing to attack the enemy, dealing Void DMG. If the Chakram is present on the battlefield, the fifth move of the attack will retrieve the Chakram and recover additional Lingering Moonlight.
result: - Deals a total of 810% Void DMG. The fifth move of the attack sequence retrieves the Chakram and additionally recovers 20 points of Lingering Moonlight.

basic_attack.name: Lunar Assault
basic_attack.button_press: During Main Sequence / Parousía Télous + Tap Basic Attack

description.desc: Alternates between controlling the Chakram and Bladed Wing to attack the enemy, dealing Void DMG. During Main Sequence, the fourth and sixth move of the attack will recover additional Lingering Moonlight.
result: - Deals a total of 1410% Void DMG. During Main Sequence, the fourth and sixth move of the attack additionally recover 20 points of Lingering Moonlight.

description.desc: Holding Basic Attack activates Reaping Moon, during which Luna pulls in enemies in the area and continuously gains Lingering Moonlight. Luna gains Super Armor and 50% DMG Reduction while performing Reaping Moon. The dodge meter will not recover during Reaping Moon, but Luna will automatically dodge incoming attacks.
result: - During Reaping Moon, recover 40 points of Lingering Moonlight every second.
- Maximum points of Lingering Moonlight: 90.

description.desc: During Reaping Moon, releasing Basic Attack when Lingering Moonlight reaches 0 / 45 / 90 points triggers Breaking Moon, during which Luna slowly ascends before smiting down the target, pulling in nearby enemies and dealing Void DMG. Luna gains Super Armor and 50% DMG Reduction while performing Breaking Moon. The dodge meter will not recover during Breaking Moon.
result: - Luna will automatically perform Breaking Moon when Lingering Moonlight reaches the maximum value.
- While in the Protostar state, Breaking Moon deals 400% / 600% / 800% Void DMG.
- While in Main Sequence / Parousía Télous, Luna will perform a different move: she swings the Bladed Wing to perform a slashing attack in a large area, dealing 500% / 750% / 1000% Void DMG.
- Luna is invincible when she performs Breaking Moon with maximum Lingering Moonlight. This also consumes all points of Lingering Moonlight, activates Mene Eskháte, and recovers 24 Energy.

basic_attack.name: Orbital Blade
basic_attack.button_press: Second move of the Basic Attack / Yellow Signal Orb skill

description.desc: After performing the second move of the Basic Attack or Yellow Signal Orb skill, the Chakram remains on the battlefield, continuously dealing Void DMG. When the Chakram is on the battlefield, Luna will begin her Basic Attack sequence from the third move.
result: - The Chakram deals 50% Void DMG to enemies in the area every 0.5s for 1.5s.

description.desc: Swings the Bladed Wing to attack the enemy, dealing Void DMG and gaining Lingering Moonlight and Apocalyptic Moonlight.
result: - Deals a total of 150% / 300% / 480% Void DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.
- If the Chakram is present on the battlefield, Luna will retrieve it.
- Gains 10 / 20 / 30 points of Lingering Moonlight based on the number of orbs pinged.
- Gains 5 / 10 / 15 points of Apocalyptic Moonlight based on the number of orbs pinged.

description.desc: Leaps into the air and throws the Chakram, dealing Void DMG and gaining Lingering Moonlight and Apocalyptic Moonlight.
result: - Deals a total of 140% / 280% / 420% Void DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.
- If the Chakram is present on the battlefield, Luna will perform a different move: she swings the Bladed Wing at the target and retrieves the Chakram, dealing a total of 180% / 360% / 540% Void DMG.
- Gains 10 / 20 / 30 points of Lingering Moonlight based on the number of orbs pinged.
- Gains 5 / 10 / 15 points of Apocalyptic Moonlight based on the number of orbs pinged.

description.desc: Dashes forward, leaps into the air, then spins to attack the target, dealing Void DMG and gaining Lingering Moonlight and Apocalyptic Moonlight.
result: - Deals a total of 190% / 380% / 570% Void DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.
- If the Chakram is present on the battlefield, Luna will retrieve it.
- Gains 10 / 20 / 30 points of Lingering Moonlight based on the number of orbs pinged.
- Gains 5 / 10 / 15 points of Apocalyptic Moonlight based on the number of orbs pinged.

desc: Upon entry, Luna enters the  Protostar state. While in the  Protostar state, all Signal Orbs are converted to Yellow Sigal Orbs, and Basic Attacks will only generate Yellow Signal Orbs. Upon entering  Main Sequence, all Signal Orbs are converted to Red or Blue Signal Orbs, and Basic Attacks will only generate Red or Blue Signal Orbs. Upon entering  Parousía Télous, Luna can no longer gain or ping Signal Orbs and can only ping  Telos Orbs.

skills.name: Apocalyptic Moonlight
skills.button_press: Perform Signal Orb skills / Automatically gained by performing Breaking Moon with maximum Lingering Moonlight

desc: Luna gains  Apocalyptic Moonlight by using a Signal Orb skill, performing  Breaking Moon with maximum  Lingering Moonlight, or performing  Original Retribution.  Apocalyptic Moonlight amplifies the Base DMG of  Signature - Moonfall during  Main Sequence, or Final Retribution during  Parousía Télous.
result: - Gains 5 / 10 / 15 points of Apocalyptic Moonlight based on the number of Signal Orbs pinged.
- Gains 45 points of Apocalyptic Moonlight upon performing Breaking Moon with maximum Lingering Moonlight or performing Original Retribution.
- Maximum Apocalyptic Moonlight: 300.

skills.name: Original Retribution
skills.button_press: Main Sequence + Mene Eskháte is active + Reaping Moon + Release Basic Attack

desc: If  Mene Eskháte is already active during  Main Sequence, releasing Basic Attack in the middle of  Reaping Moon will trigger  Original Retribution, in which Luna gathers energy and fires it towards the target to cause an explosion, pulling in nearby enemies, dealing Void DMG, and recovering  24 Energy. During this, Luna is invincible but cannot recover the dodge meter or perform  Signature - Moonfall.
result: - If Lingering Moonlight is not at the maximum value, Original Retribution deals 1500% Void DMG.
- If Lingering Moonlight is at the maximum value, Original Retribution grants 45 points of Apocalyptic Moonlight before dealing 3000% Void DMG and consuming all points of Lingering Moonlight.
- Luna will automatically perform Original Retribution when Lingering Moonlight reaches the maximum value.

skills.name: Final Retribution
skills.button_press: Parousía Télous + Mene Eskháte is active + Reaping Moon + Release Basic Attack

desc: If  Mene Eskháte is already active during  Parousía Télous, releasing Basic Attack in the middle of  Reaping Moon will trigger  Final Retribution, in which Luna gathers energy and fires it towards the target to cause an explosion, pulling in nearby enemies, dealing Void DMG, and amplifying the DMG of the attack by consuming all points of  Apocalyptic Moonlight. During this, Luna is invincible but cannot recover the dodge meter or perform  Signature - Moonfall.
result: - Final Retribution deals 3800% Void DMG. Every 10 points of Apocalyptic Moonlight amplifies the Base DMG of the attack by 4%.

desc: During  Parousía Télous, Luna continuously consumes  Lingering Moonlight and cannot continuously gain  Lingering Moonlight through  Reaping Moon. Every Basic Attack grants an  Telos Orb. Every cast of  Breaking Moon grants  30 points of  Lingering Moonlight and  3 Telos Orbs. Luna will exit  Parousía Télous when  Lingering Moonlight reaches  0. All  Telos Orbs will disappear upon exiting  Parousía Télous.
result: - During Parousía Télous, consume 10 points of Lingering Moonlight every second.

- Pinging an Telos Orb triggers Voidal Delamination, dealing 400% Void DMG and recovering 12 Energy and 20 points of Lingering Moonlight. When Mene Eskháte is active, additionally gain 15 points of Apocalyptic Moonlight.

desc: During  Main Sequence / Parousía Télous, Luna: Oblivion's Base DMG efficiency against Homeostatic Forcefield increases by  100%.

description.desc: Shatters the spatial dimension and pulls everything into a domain of dead stars, dealing Void DMG, triggering Time Lag Calculation, and entering Main Sequence.
result: - Deals a total of 1200% Void DMG.

description.desc: Consume all Signal Orbs to rip apart the dimension and pull everything into a domain of dead stars, dealing Void DMG. Afterwards, gain Apocalyptic Moonlight based on the number of Signal Orbs consumed. This fills Lingering Moonlight to the maximum value, activates Mene Eskháte, and Luna enters Parousía Télous.
result: - Deals a total of 1450% Void DMG.
- Gain 10 / 20 / 30 / 60 / 90 / 150 points of Apocalyptic Moonlight based on the number of Signal Orbs consumed.

skills.name: Moonfall
skills.button_press: During Main Sequence / Parousía Télous + Consume 70 Energy + Tap Signature Move

description.desc: Condenses consciousness to collapse the space and annihilate everything, dealing Void DMG and triggering Time Lag Calculation. Afterwards, exits Main Sequence / Parousía Télous and enters the Protostar state. If Luna performs Moonfall during Main Sequence, she will consume all Apocalyptic Moonlight to amplify the DMG of the attack.
result: - Deals a total of 3200% Void DMG.
- If Luna performs Moonfall during Main Sequence, every 10 points of Apocalyptic Moonlight increases the Base DMG of the attack by 4%.

description.desc: Slashes with the Bladed Wing, dealing Void DMG.
result: - Deals a total of 600% Void DMG.

leader.name: Red Moon in the Empty Sky

description.desc: Increases Void DMG of all members by 10%. Increases ATK of all Annihilator Omniframes by 10%.
Extra DMG Bonus increases by 20%. Converts all members' Elemental Resistance Reduction and Elemental DMG Increase effects into Omni-elemental DMG Reduction and DMG Increase effects.

levels.desc: Upon performing  Original Retribution / Final Retribution,  Signature - Parousía Télous, or  Signature - Moonfall, trigger all available QTEs.

Upon performing  Signature - Main Sequence or  Signature - Parousía Télous, trigger Matrix if available. During  Main Sequence, every  10 points of  Apocalyptic Moonlight amplifies Base DMG of  Original Retribution by  4%. If Luna exits the battlefield during  Parousía Télous, the Chakram will perform an attack that deals  2000% Void DMG.

Base DMG of  Signature - Moonfall increases by  20%. Upon automatically dodging an incoming attack during  Reaping Moon, gain  20 points of  Lingering Moonlight.  Voidal Delamination can evade incoming attacks and grants  6 Telos Orbs upon successfully evading an attack.
The obtain rate of  Apocalyptic Moonlight doubles. Maximum points of  Apocalyptic Moonlight increases to  600.

When performing  Signature - Parousía Télous, each Signal Orb consumed amplifies Base DMG of  Signature - Parousía Télous by  40% (up to  240%). During  Main Sequence / Parousía Télous, Luna: Oblivion's Base DMG efficiency against Homeostatic Forcefield effect increases to  150%.
Extra DMG of  Signature - Moonfall and  Signature - Parousía Télous increases by  40%.
Extra DMG of 3-Pings and  Voidal Delamination increases by  40%.
Extra DMG of  Original Retribution,  Final Retribution, and  Breaking Moon cast with  Lingering Moonlight at the maximum value increases by  40%.

basic_attack.name: Splendorous Tone
basic_attack.button_press: Exquisite Rhyme - Way of the Strings + Tap Basic Attack

description.desc: Uses the Pipa's melody in conjunction with dance moves to attack the target, dealing Physical DMG and gaining Complex Time.
result: - Deals a total of 340% Physical DMG.
- Each move of the attack sequence grants 2 / 4 / 6 / 8 points of Complex Time respectively.

basic_attack.name: Rippling Reflection
basic_attack.button_press: Way of the Strings + Hold Basic Attack

description.desc: Rapidly plays consecutive notes with the Pipa to attack the target, continuously dealing Physical DMG and gaining Complex Time. While performing this skill, Hanying can move and recover Signal Orbs at an increased rate. Upon releasing Basic Attack, Hanying rushes towards the target, dealing Physical DMG. Hanying can evade incoming attacks during the rush.
result: - Deals 60 Physical DMG and gains 6 points of Complex Time every second.
- The rush deals 40% Physical DMG.

basic_attack.name: Keen Inflection
basic_attack.button_press: Way of Strife + Tap Basic Attack

description.desc: Uses the hairpin to perform a series of attacks against the target, dealing Physical DMG and gaining Complex Time. While performing this skill, Hanying recovers Signal Orbs at an increased rate. Attacking after dodging will directly perform the 4th move of the attack sequence.
result: - Deals a total of 460% Physical DMG.
- Each move of the attack sequence grants 3 / 6 / 9 / 12 points of Complex Time respectively.

red_orb.name: Strings Plucked, Sound Abound
red_orb.button_press: Red Orb - Possess at least 1 White Orb + Tap Red Orb

description.desc: Quickly plays notes with the Pipa, dealing Physical DMG. Performing this skill consumes 1 White Orb while granting Complex Time, Veiled Edge, and Super Armor. Performing this skill in Matrix is considered a 3-Ping and immediately grants 2 White Orbs.
result: - Deals a total of 150% Physical DMG.
- Performing this skill grants 15 points of Complex Time and 5 points of Veiled Edge.
- Performing this skill grants in Matrix grants 45 points of Complex Time and 15 points of Veiled Edge.

yellow_orb.name: As I Haltingly Lingered
yellow_orb.button_press: Possess at least 1 White Orb + Tap Yellow Orb

description.desc: Turns around and plays the Pipa, gathering surrounding targets and dealing Physical DMG. While turning around, Hanying can evade incoming attacks. Performing this skill requires consuming at least 1 White Orb. This skill grants Complex Time and Veiled Edge based on the number of White Orbs consumed. Performing this skill in Matrix consumes only 1 White Orb and will be considered as a 3-Ping.
result: - Deals a total of 60% / 120% / 180% Physical DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.
- Gains 5 / 10 / 15 points of Complex Time based on the number of orbs pinged.
- Gains 5 / 10 / 15 points of Veiled Edge based on the number of orbs pinged.

description.desc: Summons a double to consecutively stab the target together, dealing Physical DMG. This skill grants Complex Time and Veiled Edge.
result: - Deals a total of 120% / 240% / 360% Physical DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.
- Gains 10 / 20 / 30 points of Complex Time based on the number of orbs pinged.
- Gains 5 / 10 / 50 points of Veiled Edge based on the number of orbs pinged.

desc: While  Way of the Strings is active, all Signal Orbs will be converted into White Signal Orbs. While  Way of Strife is active, all Signal Orbs will be converted into Blue Signal Orbs. Hanying: Solacetune gains  30% DMG Reduction while she has a shield.

Pinging 6 White Orbs in  Way of the Strings grants a  Harmonics Orb. When the  Harmonics Orb is present, Red and Yellow Orbs are temporarily hidden. Pinging the  Harmonics Orb activates  Moonsong Realm.  Moonsong Realm weakens enemies and strengthens allies inside its area of effect while active. Hanying: Solacetune will exit  Moonsong Realm upon leaving the battlefield or performing  Signature-Hymn of the Pale Moon.
result: - Gains Super Armor during the animation of activating Moonsong Realm and deals 1000% Physical DMG after inflicting 1 stack of the Mark of Evanescence on nearby enemies. Gains 20 Signature Energy and 55 points of Veiled Edge.

- Every second, Moonsong Realm inflicts enemies inside with Piercing Strike effect that reduces Physical Defense by 20% and the Penetrating Pivot effect that reduces Physical Resistance by 10% for 8s. Triggering these effects again refreshes their duration.
- Moonsong Realm imbues allies inside with the Mingling Moon and Lantern effect and grants them 1 stack of Song of Red Clouds every second.
- Mingling Moon and Lantern: Accumulation rate of Veiled Edge increases by 50% for 8s. Triggering it again will refresh its duration.
- Song of Red Clouds: Gains a shield equal to 5% of Hanying: Solacetune's Max HP for 3s; this effect can stack up to 4 times, and triggering it again will refresh its duration.

skills.name: Azure Allure
skills.button_press: Way of Strife + 30 Complex Time + Tap Signature Move

desc: Basic Attacks and Signal Orb skills grant  Complex Time. Maximum points of  Complex Time:  120. Tap Signature Move while in  Way of Strife to consume  30 points of  Complex Time to unleash  Azure Allure and deal Physical DMG to the target. This skill can trigger  Trueslash when it hits the target. While performing this skill, Hanying: Solacetune gains Super Armor and can evade incoming attacks. When performed consecutively, the Base DMG of  Azure Allure increases by  50% every cast. This effect can stack up to twice, and subsequent casts of  Azure Allure will retain the maximum multiplier after the Base DMG increase effect reaches the maximum value. Gain  5 Signature Energy upon performing this skill. When performed consecutively, the amount of Signature Energy granted by this skill doubles every cast. The maximum value of Signature Energy granted by a single cast of this skill is  40.
result: - Azure Allure deals 300% Physical DMG; triggers Trueslash when this skill hits the target.
- Lavish Azure Allure: If performed with maximum points of Complex Time, trigger Phoenix Down once.

- Sonorous Azure Allure: Upon performing the fourth move of the Basic Attack sequence or a Blue 3-Ping, the Seal of Flow will briefly appear. Performing Azure Allure while the Seal of Flow is present causes a double to attack the target together, dealing 150% Trueslash DMG.

desc: Performing  Lavish Azure Allure inside  Moonsong Realm triggers  Phoenix Down. The realm reverberates, releasing sound waves that travel to the realm's edge and pulling in enemies in the area. Deals Trueslash DMG and inflicts 1 stack of the Mark of Evanescence on enemies; one enemy can be inflicted with up to 3 stacks of the  Mark of Evanescence. At the same time, Hanying: Solacetune gains 1 stack of  Relentless. Maximum number of  Relentless stacks:  3. Hanying: Solacetune can enter Matrix by dodging  Phoenix Down.
result: - Deals 200% Trueslash DMG.

skills.name: Sublimity
skills.button_press: Way of Strife + Mark of Evanescence + Tap Basic Attack

desc: Performing Basic Attacks against a target that is inflicted with the  Mark of Evanescence triggers  Sublimity, during which Hanying: Solacetune gains Super Armor. When the attack hits the target, deals Trueslash DMG based on the number of the  Mark of Evanescence stacks and recovers Signal Orbs based on the number of  Relentless stacks by consuming all  Mark of Evanescence stacks on the target and  Relentless stacks on self.
result: - Sublimity deals 300% Trueslash DMG and can trigger Trueslash when it hits the target.
- Increases the Base DMG of Sublimity by 0% / 150% / 300% based on the number of the Mark of Evanescence stacks consumed.
- Recovers 2 / 3 / 4 Signal Orbs based on the number of Relentless stacks consumed.

desc: Certain skills can accumulate  Veiled Edge points.  Veiled Edge points can be inherited by the next character with the Trueslash Effect. Maximum points of  Veiled Edge: 999.
result: - When Veiled Edge points reach 100, perform Trueslash by consuming 100 Veiled Edge points upon hitting the enemy with the next cast of a skill that can trigger Trueslash, dealing 400% Trueslash DMG.
- Gains 1 point of Veracity every time Trueslash is triggered. Maximum points of Veracity: 90.

description.desc: Pulls out the hairpin and enters Way of Strife, launching a blitz strike at the target to deal Physical DMG while activating Time Lag Calculation. If the target has the Mark of Evanescence, consume 1 stack of the Mark of Evanescence to make this cast of Viridian Flutter a guaranteed CRIT with the Base DMG increased by 100%.
result: - Deals 250% Physical DMG.

skills.name: Hymn of the Pale Moon
skills.button_press: Way of Strife + Consume 100 Energy + Hold Signature Move

description.desc: After a string of piercing strikes, unleashes a finishing blow to the target, gathering surrounding targets and dealing Physical DMG while activating Time Lag Calculation. Afterwards, exits Moonsong Realm.
result: - Deals 2500% Physical DMG.

description.desc: Gathers the surrounding enemy units while dealing Physical DMG, inflicting the targets with the  Piercing Strike effect that reduces Physical Defense and the  Penetrating Pivot effect that reduces Physical Resistance.
result: - Piercing Strike reduces the target's Physical Defense by 20% for 8s.
- Penetrating Pivot reduces the target's Physical Resistance by 10% for 8s.

description.desc: Increases Physical DMG of all members by 10%. Increases DMG of Tank Omniframes by 5%.
Attacks reduce the target's Extra DMG Reduction by 20% for 5s.

levels.desc: Upon unleashing  Signature-Viridian Flutter,  Signature-Hymn of the Pale Moon, activate all available QTEs.

Gains  15 Complex Time every time Hanying: Solacetune enters the battlefield. Upon pinging  Harmonics Orb, immediately gain 3 Signal Orbs. If lacking  Complex Time when continuously unleashing  Azure Allure, can consume 3 Signal Orbs to substitute for the consumption of  Complex Time.  Signature-Hymn of the Pale Moon Base DMG increases by  100%.  Piercing Strike effect applied by Hanying: Solacetune increases by  20%.

sss_rank.name: A Magpie, Perched on the Branch

levels.desc: Gains 3 Signal Orbs every time Hanying: Solacetune enters the battlefield. While in  Way of Strife, Extra DMG Bonus increases by  15%.  Mingling Moon and Lantern effect applied by Hanying: Solacetune increases by  50%;  Penetrating Pivot effect increases by  5%.

Base DMG amplifying effect from each consecutive cast of  Azure Allure increases to  100%. While in  Way of Strife, triggers a single cast of  Phoenix Down upon completely filling  Complex Time points inside  Moonsong Realm. Extra DMG of  Trueslash performed by Hanying: Solacetune increases by  100%.  Penetrating Pivot effect applied by Hanying: Solacetune increases by  10%. Reduces swap cooldown of all party members by  3s; this cannot be stacked with other swap cooldown-reducing effects.
Extra DMG Bonus of  Signature-Viridian Flutter, Signature-Hymn of the Pale Moon increases by  30%.
Extra DMG Bonus of  Phoenix Down, Harmonics Orb, and  Signal Orbs increase by  30%.
Extra DMG Bonus of  Azure Allure and  Sublimity increases by  30%.

description.desc: Uses the Revolver to perform consecutive attacks against the enemy and summons lightweight drones to aid in the battle.
result: - Deals a total of 464% Ice DMG.

basic_attack.name: Bullet Hail
basic_attack.button_press: Calibration Mode + Cylinder is not empty + Hold Basic Attack

description.desc: Activates Double-Action Mode, using the hidden Cylinder to continuously consume Condensation Rounds and fire at the enemy. Gains Super Armor and 50% DMG Reduction during this. Depending on the current Calibration Mode, deals Ice DMG or Hiemal DMG while gaining additional Signature Energy.
result: - If fired in Calibration Mode: Quiescence, each shot consumes 2 Condensation rounds, dealing 220% Ice DMG.
- If fired in Calibration Mode: Desolation, each shot consumes 2 Condensation rounds, dealing 140% Hiemal DMG and granting 100 Glaciation Points.
- Each shot additionally grants 5 / 9 / 13 / 17 / 21 / 40 Signature Energy based on the current number of shots fired. Exiting Double-Action Mode resets the counter.
- When Wanshi runs out of Condensation Rounds or exits Calibration Mode, he will exit Double-Action Mode after a short delay.

red_orb.name: Hyperborean Current
red_orb.button_press: Gale Strike - Calibration Mode + Ping Red Orb

description.desc: Consumes 1 Condensation Round to fire at the enemy, dealing Ice or Hiemal DMG depending on the current Calibration Mode. When this skill is performed consecutively, Wanshi enters Burst Mode, during which he gains Super Armor, 50% DMG Reduction, Wounding buff, and additional Signature Energy.
result: - When fired in Calibration Mode: Quiescence, deals 220% Ice DMG.
- When fired in Calibration Mode: Desolation, deals 140% Hiemal DMG and grants 100 Glaciation Points.

- When performed consecutively, Wanshi enters Burst Mode, gaining the Wounding buff. The Wounding buff increases the Base DMG of the next Gale Strike cast by 7.5% for 3s. Triggering this effect again refreshes its duration. Maximum no. of Wounding stacks: 12. Exiting Burst Mode clears all Wounding stacks. Wanshi additionally gains 25% Base DMG Increase when he has the maximum no. of Wounding stacks.
- Exiting Calibration Mode automatically ends Burst Mode.
- When in Burst Mode, each shot additionally grants 2 / 6 / 10 / 14 / 18 / 37 Signature Energy based on the current number of shots fired. Exiting Burst Mode resets the counter.

red_orb.name: Airdropped Revolver
red_orb.button_press: Ancillary Revolver + Calibration Mode + Empty Cylinder + Tap Red Orb

description.desc: Commands the lightweight drone to consume and toss out an Ancillary Revolver, pulling in enemies and dealing Ice DMG. Freezes the Calibration Meter while performing this skill. After catching the thrown revolver, Wanshi can replace his gun to reload the Cylinder and refresh the duration of Calibration Mode.
result: - Deals 800% Ice DMG when throwing the Ancillary Revolver. Tapping Red Orb again or dodging will make Wanshi: Lucid Dreamer automatically rush to the Ancillary Revolver's landing point, during which he will be invincible. Upon successfully catching the thrown revolver, reload the Cylinder and refresh the duration of Calibration Mode.

red_orb.name: Effulgent Shatter
red_orb.button_press: Ancillary Revolver + Calibration Mode + During Bullet Hail + Empty Cylinder + Tap Red Orb

description.desc: Expends the Ancillary Revolver to reload the Cylinder and consumes Condensation Rounds to trigger Frosty Ascent. Freezes the Calibration Meter and grants invincibility to Wanshi while performing this skill. Deals Ice or Hiemal DMG depending on the current Calibration Mode. Tapping Red Orb again or dodging during Frosty Ascent will make Wanshi command the lightweight drone to throw an Ancillary Revolver; this freezes the Calibration Meter, pulls in enemies, and deals Ice DMG. Upon successfully catching the thrown revolver, reload the Cylinder and refresh the duration of Calibration Mode.
result: - Frosty Ascent deals 75% Ice DMG; deals 420% Hiemal DMG instead and gains 400 Glaciation Points if in Calibration Mode: Desolation. Every 2 Condensation Rounds consumed while performing Frosty Ascent grants 13 Signature Energy.

- Wanshi can replace his gun during Frosty Ascent by tapping Red Orb again, dealing 800% Ice DMG. Tapping Red Orb or dodging at that moment will make Wanshi: Lucid Dreamer automatically rush to the Ancillary Revolver's landing point, during which he will be invincible. Upon successfully catching the thrown revolver, reload the Cylinder and refresh the duration of Calibration Mode.

red_orb.name: Swift Phantom
red_orb.button_press: Not in Calibration Mode + When dodging + Ping Red Orb

description.desc: Summons a lightweight drone projection to attack the enemy, dealing Ice DMG. Gain 3 Condensation Rounds upon performing this skill.
result: - Deals 500% Ice DMG.

description.desc: Draws the gun and charges forward, dealing Ice DMG, gaining Calibration Points, and accumulating Glaciation Points. Gains additional Signature Energy upon a 3-Ping.
result: - Deals 90% / 180% / 270% Ice DMG, gains 20 / 40 / 80 Calibration Points, and accumulates 10 / 20 / 30 Glaciation Points based on the number of orbs pinged. Calibration Meter can be charged up to 80% using this method.
- Additionally, gains 8 Signature Energy upon a 3-Ping.

description.desc: Steps back before slamming forward, dealing Ice DMG, gaining Calibration Points, and accumulating Glaciation Points. Gains additional Signature Energy upon a 3-Ping.
result: - Deals 120% / 240% / 360% Ice DMG, gains 20 / 40 / 80 Calibration Points, and accumulates 10 / 20 / 30 Glaciation Points based on the number of orbs pinged. Calibration Meter can be charged up to 80% using this method.
- Additionally, gains 8 Signature Energy upon a 3-Ping.

description.desc: Depending on the timing of casting this skill, Wanshi will either perform a close-range shot or provide covering fire, dealing Ice DMG.
result: - Deals a total of 90% / 180% / 270% Ice DMG based on the number of Yellow Orbs pinged.

- If Wanshi is attacked while performing a close-range shot, he will instead trigger covering fire, dealing 600% Ice DMG and gaining 40 Calibration Points. If Calibration Meter is already full when the covering fire is triggered, Wanshi can immediately enter Calibration Mode: Quiescence.
- When this skill is performed in Calibration Mode, it will be considered as performing Gale Strike.

description.desc: Steps back and throws a tactical grenade that explodes after a short delay, dealing Ice DMG to enemies, gaining Calibration Points, and accumulating Glaciation Points. If Wanshi: Lucid Dreamer is within the area of the explosion, it will be considered as dealing DMG to himself. Gains additional Signature Energy upon a 3-Ping.
result: - Deals 70% / 140% / 270% Ice DMG, gains 20 / 40 / 80 Calibration Points, and accumulates 10 / 20 / 30 Glaciation Points based on the number of orbs pinged. Calibration Meter can be charged up to 80% using this method.
- Additionally, gains 8 Signature Energy upon a 3-Ping.

description.desc: Summons a lightweight drone to immediately detonate the grenade, dealing Ice DMG to enemies, gaining Calibration Points, and accumulating Glaciation Points. If Wanshi: Lucid Dreamer is within the area of the explosion, it will be considered as dealing DMG to himself. Gains additional Signature Energy upon a 3-Ping.
result: - Deals 160% / 320% / 480% Ice DMG, gains 20 / 40 / 80 Calibration Points, and accumulates 10 / 20 / 30 Glaciation Points based on the number of orbs pinged. Calibration Meter can be charged up to 80% using this method.
- Additionally, gains 8 Signature Energy upon a 3-Ping.

description.desc: Attacks the tactical grenade to immediately trigger an explosion, dealing Ice DMG to enemies. If Wanshi: Lucid Dreamer is within the area of the explosion, it will be considered as dealing DMG to himself.
result: - Deals 90% / 180% / 270% Ice DMG based on the number of Blue Orbs pinged.

- If Wanshi is attacked while he is raising the gun during the Red Orb animation, he will instead trigger covering fire, dealing 600% Ice DMG and gaining 40 Calibration Points. If Calibration Meter is already full when the covering fire is triggered, Wanshi can immediately enter Calibration Mode: Quiescence.
- When this skill is performed in Calibration Mode, it will be considered as performing Gale Strike.

skills.name: Silence in the Snow
skills.button_press: Hold Red Orb or Hold Dodge

desc: Enters the charging state, continuously accumulating  Calibration Points. During this, gains Super Armor and  90% DMG Reduction.
result: - When the current value of Calibration Points is less than 80, gains 20 Calibration Points every second; when the current value of Calibration Points is 80 or more but less than 160, gains 40 Calibration Points every second; when the current value of Calibration Points is 160 or more, gains 80 Calibration Points every second.
- Maximum number of Calibration Points: 200

- Releasing the button early during charging will automatically trigger dodge; Calibration Points will accumulate as normal during the dodge. Additionally, gains a Signal Orb if Wanshi successfully dodges an attack.

skills.name: Cryonic Explosion
skills.button_press: Calibration Meter full + Release Red Orb or Release Dodge

desc: Depending on whether Red Orb or Dodge was held to begin charging, enter different  Calibration Modes. This move pulls in and debuffs enemies, deals DMG, grants  3 Signature Energy and an  Ancillary Revolver, and triggers Matrix if available. Gains a shield when performing  Gale Strike or  Bullet Hail in  Calibration Mode.
result: - Hold and release Red Orb to enter Calibration Mode: Quiescence, dealing 500% Ice DMG.
- Hold and release Dodge to enter Calibration Mode: Desolation, dealing 280% Hiemal DMG.
- Inflicts enemies with the Frost Corrosion effect that reduces Ice Resistance by 25% for 8s when entering Calibration Mode.

- While in Calibration Mode, Wanshi consumes 30 Calibration Points every second, and he will exit Calibration Mode when he fully depletes Calibration Points. Performing a 3-Ping in Calibration Mode grants 40 Calibration Points.
- While in Calibration Mode, each cast of Gale Strike or Bullet Hail grants a shield equal to 5% of Wanshi's maximum HP. This shield can stack up to 6 times.
- If the Cylinder is empty when entering Calibration Mode, Wanshi will immediately gain 1 Condensation Round

desc: Every time Wanshi is switched in, automatically fully reloads the  Cylinder.
Every time Wanshi consumes  Condensation Rounds, gains  Correcting Rounds and charges the CUB.
result: - When charging the CUB, every Condensation Round consumed is considered 1 Signal Orb pinged.
- Gains 1 Correcting Round for every Condensation Round consumed.
- Maximum number of Correcting Rounds: 30

desc: Wanshi can debuff enemies when damaging them with  Condensation Rounds.
result: - Inflicts enemies with the Frost Corrosion effect that reduces Ice Resistance by 25% for 8s when damaging them with Condensation Rounds.

desc: Certain skills can accumulate  Glaciation Points. When  Glaciation Points reach the maximum value,  Diamond Dust is triggered, dealing Hiemal DMG and accumulating  Diamond Dust Stacks. Certain skills can consume all  Diamond Dust Stacks to generate an  Ice Spike, which deals Hiemal DMG in the surrounding area. The  Ice Spike lasts for a period of time; when it deals Hiemal DMG during this period, it will trigger  Crystallization, dealing additional Hiemal DMG and accumulating  Crystalline Points. When the duration of the  Ice Spike expires, it will trigger  Icebreak, which deals Hiemal DMG based on the current  Crystalline Points value.  Glaciation Points, Diamond Dust Stacks, Ice Spike, and  Crystalline Points can be inherited by the next character with the  Glaciation Effect.
result: - When Glaciation Points reach 100, Diamond Dust is triggered once, dealing 100% Hiemal DMG and accumulating 1 Diamond Dust Stack. Maximum number of Diamond Dust Stacks: 10.

- When the number of Diamond Dust Stacks is greater than 0, certain skills can consume all Diamond Dust Stacks to generate an Ice Spike on the battlefield, dealing 180% Hiemal DMG. When generating the Ice Spike, every 1 Diamond Dust Stack consumed increases its duration by 1s.

- When the Ice Spike deals Hiemal DMG while it is present, it will trigger Crystallization, dealing 100% Hiemal DMG to enemies in a large area and accumulating 100 Crystalline Points. This can occur up to once every 0.25s.

- When the duration of the Ice Spike expires, it will trigger Icebreak, dealing 100% Hiemal DMG to enemies in a large area. The Base DMG of Icebreak increases by 9% for every 100 Crystalline Points. Maximum number of Crystalline Points: 10000.

skills.name: Hyperlinked Flight
skills.button_press: Consume 160 Energy + Not during Bullet Hail/Frosty Ascent + Tap Signature Move

description.desc: Summons a lightweight drone to generate a forcefield, pulling in enemies and firing a strengthened Condensation Round. Deals Ice or Hiemal DMG depending on the current Calibration Mode. Upon performing this skill, immediately gains 1 Signal Orb and rearranges Signal Orbs into 3-Pings. Time Lag Calculation is activated while performing this skill. If Wanshi has the Domain Overlimit effect when performing this skill, its duration is refreshed.
result: - When Wanshi is in Calibration Mode: Quiescence or has not entered Calibration Mode, deals 2400% Ice DMG. If Wanshi is in Calibration Mode: Quiescence when performing this skill, resets the Calibration Meter upon performing this skill and exits Calibration Mode: Quiescence.
- When Wanshi is in Calibration Mode: Desolation, deals 1400% Hiemal DMG instead; resets the Calibration Meter upon performing this skill and exits Calibration Mode: Desolation.
- Performing Hyperlinked Flight while in Burst Mode can grant the Wounding buff.
- Generates an Ice Spike upon performing this skill based on the number of Diamond Dust Stacks.

skills.name: Domain Overlimit
skills.button_press: The effect gained when Matrix is triggered that makes the next ping count as a 3-Ping.

description.desc: Ruinous Blizzard - Consume 160 Energy + During Bullet Hail/Frosty Ascent + Tap Signature Move

skills.name: The lightweight drone propels Wanshi
skills.button_press: Lucid Dreamer into the air, pulling in enemies and strafing the ground. Deals Ice DMG or Hiemal DMG depending on the current  Calibration Mode. Upon performing this skill, immediately gain 1 Signal Orb and rearrange Signal Orbs into 3-Pings.  Time Lag Calculation is activated while performing this skill. If Wanshi has the  Overlimit Domain effect when performing this skill, its duration is refreshed.

description.desc: - When Wanshi is in Calibration Mode: Quiescence, immediately deals 1850% Ice DMG; resets the Calibration Meter upon performing this skill and exits Calibration Mode: Quiescence. After exiting the battlefield, Wanshi: Lucid Dreamer will additionally deal 900% Ice DMG when performing Point-blank Shooting; this effect can be triggered only once every time he exits the battlefield.
result: - When Wanshi is in Calibration Mode: Desolation, deals 1030% Hiemal DMG instead; resets the Calibration Meter upon performing this skill and exits Calibration Mode: Desolation. After exiting the battlefield, Wanshi: Lucid Dreamer will additionally deal 500% Hiemal DMG when performing Point-blank Shooting; this effect can be triggered only once every time he exits the battlefield.

- Performing this skill consumes all Correcting Rounds. Each Correcting Round consumed increases the Base DMG of this cast of Ruinous Blizzard by 5%. If 30 Correcting Rounds have been consumed when performing this skill, additionally gains 100% Base DMG Increase and 1 Signal Orb.
- Generates an Ice Spike upon performing this skill based on the number of Diamond Dust Stacks.

description.desc: Leaves behind the Frostbound Zone that deals Ice DMG and debuffs enemies upon performing Hyperlinked Flight or Ruinous Blizzard.
result: - The Frostbound Zone deals 50% Ice DMG to enemies inside every second for 12s.

description.desc: Rushes and strikes forward, firing at close range. Deals Ice DMG and debuffs enemies.
result: - Deals 600% Ice DMG and inflicts enemies with the Frost Corrosion effect that reduces Ice Resistance by 25% for 8s.

leader.name: A Clear Heart Drowned in Illusions

description.desc: Increases Ice DMG of all members by 10%. Increases DMG of Tank Omniframes by 5%.
Attacks reduce the target's Extra DMG Reduction by 20% for 5s.

levels.desc: When entering or refreshing  Calibration Mode or performing  Hyperlinked Flight/Ruinous Blizzard, activates all available QTEs.

The entry skill is considered a Blue 3-Ping. When entering the battlefield via switch-in, gains 1 Signal Orb. When entering  Calibration Mode, gains  12 Signature Energy. While in  Calibration Mode: Desolation,  Glaciation Point accumulation rate of  Gale Strike and  Bullet Hail doubles. Base DMG of  Gale Strike and  Bullet Hail doubles.

Frost Corrosion effect applied by Wanshi: Lucid Dreamer increases by  10%. Signal Orb recovery rate increases by  100% during  Bullet Hail. Base DMG of  Cryonic Explosion increases by  200%. Base DMG of  Airdropped Revolver and  Effulgent Shatter increases by  100%.

Frost Corrosion effect applied by Wanshi: Lucid Dreamer increases by  10%. Base DMG of  Diamond Dust performed by Wanshi: Lucid Dreamer increases by  30%. When performing  Hyperlinked Flight or  Ruinous Blizzard in  Calibration Mode, increases their Base Multiplier by  1.5 times. When Wanshi: Lucid Dreamer has the maximum number of  Wounding stacks, Base DMG of  Hyperlinked Flight additionally increases by  60%. Reduces swap cooldown of all party members by  3s; this cannot be stacked with other swap cooldown-reducing effects.
Extra DMG Bonus of  Gale Strike, Bullet Hail, and  Frosty Ascent increases by  30%. Extra DMG Bonus of the DMG when generating an  Ice Spike increases by  100%.
Extra DMG Bonus of Wanshi: Lucid Dreamer increases by  10% in  Calibration Mode.
Extra DMG Bonus of  Hyperlinked Flight and  Ruinous Blizzard increases by  35%. Extra DMG Bonus of the DMG dealt by  Diamond Dust increases by  30%.
